instructions: In a conversation, tap the Memoji button , then tap the New Memoji button . Tap each feature and choose the options you want. As you add features to your Memoji, your character comes to life. Tap Done to add the Memoji to your collection.

In a conversation, tap the Memoji button . Tap a Memoji or Animoji in the top row to view the stickers in the sticker pack. To send a sticker do one of the following: Tap the sticker to add it to the message bubble. Add a comment if you want, then tap the Send button to send. Touch and hold a sticker, then drag it on top of a message in the conversation. The sticker is sent automatically when you add it to the message.

In a conversation, tap the Animoji button , then choose an Animoji or Memoji. Tap the Record button to record your facial expressions and voice. Tap the red square to stop recording. Tap Replay to review your message. Tap the Send button to send your message or the Delete button to cancel.

Open Books, then tap Book Store or Audiobooks to browse titles, or tap Search to look for a specific title. Tap a book cover to see more details, read a sample, or add it to your Want to Read collection. Tap Buy to purchase a title, or tap Get to download a free title. All purchases are made with the payment method associated with your Apple ID .

Open the Oculus App on your phone. Tap Settings in the bottom right corner. It is an icon that looks like a gear. Tap the Oculus Quest connected to your phone. Tap More Settings . Oculus Quest reset settings Source: Android Central Tap Factory Reset . Tap Reset
